title: Moroccan-Style Lamb Shanks with Apricots
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 sweet potato, peeled and diced', '2 lamb shanks', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '160g chopped dried apricots', '1 1/2 teaspoons harissa', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons flaked almonds', '175g couscous', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
